title: Firefox keeps downgrading
content: Every now and then, Firefox downgrades itself to version 121. In order to change it back, i have to update it to 127.0, and then to 137.0.1. After doing so, a couple hours will pass before tabs stop loading, and i have to close Firefox and open it again, for another error to show saying i was using an older version, and i need to update. this sends it back to version 121. The errors i get, I've attached !! There's also a troubleshoot data thing, not sure how that works though.

title: Repeated Installs

The problem is when I try installing the download again, it recognizes that Firefox was previously installed and keeps "re-installing" the previous settings, which were messed up to start with. How can I get a fresh new download with no settings setup?
